sentences.sContent: When America is under stress, as is happening right now with debates about where to pare the budget, we sometimes trample the least powerful and most vulnerable among us.
sentences.sContent_eng: When America is under stress, as is happening right now with debates about where to pare the budget, we sometimes trample the least powerful and most vulnerable among us.
sentences.sCn: 当美国正在承受压力，正如当下争论的——在哪些方面削减预算，我们有时会蹂躏那些我们中间力量最弱小、最脆弱的群体。

synos.tran: 践踏；蔑视，伤害；脚步沉重地走

remMethod.val: tr(看作tree， 树) + ample(大量的) → 大量的树苗被踩坏 → 踩坏， 践踏
